compose

  • compose(position?: Vector3, rotation?: Quaternion, scale?: Vector3): void

  • Compose a Matrix4 object from a position, rotation, and scale

    Parameters

    • position: Vector3 = Vector3.ZERO

      The position of the Matrix4 object (default Vector3.ZERO)

    • rotation: Quaternion = Quaternion.IDENTITY

      The rotation of the Matrix4 object (default Quaternion.IDENTITY)

    • scale: Vector3 = Vector3.ONE

      The scale of the Matrix4 object (default Vector3.ONE)

    Returns void

    • Defined in src/math/Matrix4.ts:1105
